DOC.brief_summary: This study aim to investigate Changes in tumor tissue and serum biomarkers before and after cetuximab combined with preoperative radiotherapy in locally advanced thoracic middle-lower segment esophageal squamous cell carcinoma.We want to find one or more effective biomarkers to predict and evaluate the patients who will be benefit from cetuximab combined with preoperative radiotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Tumor Tissue and Serum Biomarkers Before and After Cetuximab Combined With Preoperative Radiotherapy in Locally Advanced Thoracic Esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma
